4113.text: Always go into meetings or negotiations with a positive attitude. Tell yourself you're going to make this the best deal for all parties.
4113.author: Natalie Massenet

4114.text: I believe all positive things and negative things are valuable because they shape you.
4114.author: Natalie Massenet

4115.text: I'm confident that the commitment of the co-chairs of the Ferguson Commission - along with the work of other local leaders and the Missouri General Assembly - will have a very positive impact as this community works to move forward.
4115.author: Roy Blunt

4116.text: People naturally want to know about what happened, about my leukemia. They ask the same questions again and again. And there have been so many positive conclusions, even through the bad times, that I don't mind at all to be reminded of my struggles.
4116.author: Jose Carreras

4117.text: I tend to regard the Coase theorem as a stepping stone on the way to an analysis of an economy with positive transaction costs.
4117.author: Ronald Coase

4119.text: Resilience isn't a single skill. It's a variety of skills and coping mechanisms. To bounce back from bumps in the road as well as failures, you should focus on emphasizing the positive.
4119.author: Jean Chatzky

4120.text: I work so hard to make that sure I'm successful. If you're positive and really excited and enthusiastic about what you're doing, it's going to happen, and it's going to happen big time.
4120.author: Shawn Mendes

4121.text: One out of every 100 American men is HIV positive. The rate of infection has reached epidemic proportions in 40 developing nations.
4121.author: Philip Emeagwali

4122.text: Some people can be president, some people can speak, some people, you know, anything that's positive, man - a dentist, a doctor. Just hang in there and never give up, and find out what is your talent. First you got to find your talent and just stick with your talent, and I guarantee you'll get there, man.
4122.author: Juicy J

4123.text: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
4123.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

4124.text: The person who can bring the spirit of laughter into a room is indeed blessed.
4124.author: Bennett Cerf

4125.text: I feel that sin and evil are the negative part of you, and I think it's like a battery: you've got to have the negative and the positive in order to be a complete person.
4125.author: Dolly Parton

4126.text: You can't make positive choices for the rest of your life without an environment that makes those choices easy, natural, and enjoyable.
4126.author: Deepak Chopra

4127.text: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything.
4127.author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

4128.text: Miracles occur naturally as expressions of love. The real miracle is the love that inspires them. In this sense everything that comes from love is a miracle.
4128.author: Marianne Williamson

4129.text: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further than a great idea that inspires no one.
4129.author: Mary Kay Ash

4130.text: Your destiny is to fulfill those things upon which you focus most intently. So choose to keep your focus on that which is truly magnificent, beautiful, uplifting and joyful. Your life is always moving toward something.
4130.author: Ralph Marston

4131.text: I think anything is possible if you have the mindset and the will and desire to do it and put the time in.
4131.author: Roger Clemens

4132.text: Wondrous is the strength of cheerfulness, and its power of endurance - the cheerful man will do more in the same time, will do it; better, will preserve it longer, than the sad or sullen.
4132.author: Thomas Carlyle

4133.text: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.
4133.author: Tiger Woods

4134.text: Where men of judgment creep and feel their way, The positive pronounce without dismay.
4134.author: William Cowper

4136.text: People deal too much with the negative, with what is wrong. Why not try and see positive things, to just touch those things and make them bloom?
4136.author: Nhat Hanh

4137.text: You must not under any pretense allow your mind to dwell on any thought that is not positive, constructive, optimistic, kind.
4137.author: Emmet Fox

4138.text: A year or so ago I went through all the people in my life and asked myself: does this person inspire me, genuinely love me and support me unconditionally? I wanted nothing but positive influences in my life.
4138.author: Mena Suvari

4139.text: So long as you've got your friends about you, and a good positive attitude, you don't really have to care what everyone else thinks.
4139.author: Gail Porter

4140.text: I am not embarrassed to tell you that I believe in miracles.
4140.author: Corazon Aquino

4141.text: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple.
4141.author: Paulo Coelho

4142.text: Delete the negative; accentuate the positive!
4142.author: Donna Karan

4143.text: I surround myself with positive, productive people of good will and decency.
4143.author: Ted Nugent

4144.text: Dream small dreams. If you make them too big, you get overwhelmed and you don't do anything. If you make small goals and accomplish them, it gives you the confidence to go on to higher goals.
4144.author: John H. Johnson

4145.text: Sometimes the most positive thing you can be in a boring society is absolutely negative.
4145.author: John Lydon

4146.text: I really struggle with that feeling of helplessness. That's why I really try to get my blogs, and even myself, to point to the positive and look at all the inspiring things that are happening.
4146.author: Daryl Hannah

4147.text: Some people never contribute anything positive to society, they may even drain our resources, but most of us try to do something better, to give back.
4147.author: Martin Yan

4148.text: I believe that you should gravitate to people who are doing productive and positive things with their lives.
4148.author: Nadia Comaneci

4149.text: Chaotic people often have chaotic lives, and I think they create that. But if you try and have an inner peace and a positive attitude, I think you attract that.
4149.author: Imelda Staunton

4150.text: Talking is always positive. That's why I talk too much.
4150.author: Louis C. K.

4151.text: It's your outlook on life that counts. If you take yourself lightly and don't take yourself too seriously, pretty soon you can find the humor in our everyday lives. And sometimes it can be a lifesaver.
4151.author: Betty White

4152.text: The best thing to do when you find yourself in a hurting or vulnerable place is to surround yourself with the strongest, finest, most positive people you know.
4152.author: Kristin Armstrong

4153.text: My purpose: to lift your spirit and to motivate you.
4153.author: Mavis Staples

4155.text: It's important to think good, speak good, and do good. If we want to see positive change in the world, then we need to connect to goodness. I try in everything I do, both in business and philanthropy, to make a positive change and do that by doing good.
4155.author: Shari Arison

4156.text: I truly believe in positive synergy, that your positive mindset gives you a more hopeful outlook, and belief that you can do something great means you will do something great.
4156.author: Russell Wilson

4158.text: My ultimate aim is to make euthanasia a positive experience.
4158.author: Jack Kevorkian

4159.text: Cognitive therapy is based on the idea that when you change the way you think, you can change the way you feel and behave. In other words, if we can learn to think about other people in a more positive and realistic way, it will be far easier to resolve conflicts and develop rewarding personal and professional relationships.
4159.author: David D. Burns

4160.text: Well, you know, a lot of people look at the negative things, the things that they did wrong and - which I do. But I like to stress on the things I did right, because there are certain things that I like to look at from a positive standpoint that are just positive reinforcement.
4160.author: Tiger Woods

4161.text: If we could get your subconscious mind to agree with your conscious mind about being happy, that's when your positive thoughts work.
4161.author: Bruce Lipton

4162.text: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
4162.author: Christie Brinkley

4163.text: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
4163.author: Bo Bennett

4164.text: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.
4164.author: Bo Bennett

4165.text: Black Consciousness is an attitude of the mind and a way of life, the most positive call to emanate from the black world for a long time.
4165.author: Steven Biko

4166.text: Christians were instructed to serve others, and the thanksgiving was for the grace of God and the fact that God offered a way for man to return to a positive relationship with Him.
4166.author: John Clayton

4167.text: The object of my relationship with Vietnam has been to heal the wounds that exist, particularly among our veterans, and to move forward with a positive relationship,... Apparently some in the Vietnamese government don't want to do that and that's their decision.
4167.author: Ho Chi Minh

4168.text: Sexy in India is not considered positive. But, with today's crop of fresh faces in the modelling arena, being sexy is an asset.
4168.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

4169.text: I think fitness is important. I think a healthy lifestyle is important. I think putting positive energy out there is important and just staying connected with the people.
4169.author: LL Cool J

4171.text: I realized that if my thoughts immediately affect my body, I should be careful about what I think. Now if I get angry, I ask myself why I feel that way. If I can find the source of my anger, I can turn that negative energy into something positive.
4171.author: Yoko Ono

4172.text: I had many teachers that were great, positive role models and taught me to be a good person and stand up and be a good man. A lot of the principals they taught me still affect how I act sometimes and it's 30 years later.
4172.author: Kevin James

4173.text: Optimists are usually wrong. But all the great change in history, positive change, was done by optimists.
4173.author: Thomas Friedman

4174.text: When you're a houseguest and you leave, it's nice to straighten something up or send your hosts a useful gift. And when you leave the planet, it's nice to have made a positive contribution.
4174.author: Alexander Payne

4175.text: I have my team. Like if you see everyone around me - I have my hair and makeup girl, my assistant. They're very calm, they're all about positive energy. There're no drama queens. Everyone wants everyone else to have a positive experience. There are no agendas. I think it creates a healthy environment and there are no boundaries to cross.
4175.author: Fergie

4176.text: More brands are waking up to their social responsibility and doing good work through cause marketing campaigns. Yet too many still go about it the wrong way. I mean 'wrong' in two senses. Firstly, they are marketing ineffectively, and secondly, as a consequence their positive social impact is not maximized.
4176.author: Simon Mainwaring

4177.text: I am happy to say that everyone that I have met in my life, I have gained something from them; be it negative or positive, it has enforced and reinforced my life in some aspect.
4177.author: Walter Payton

4178.text: When you think positive, good things happen.
4178.author: Matt Kemp

4179.text: Life is short, youth is finite, and opportunities endless. Have you found the intersection of your passion and the potential for world-shaping positive impact? If you don't have a great idea of your own, there are plenty of great teams that need you - unknown startups and established teams in giant companies alike.
4179.author: Justin Rosenstein

4180.text: It is a blessing to have pretty people around me. I like people who are sparky, positive. Evil, dark people are repelled by me: 'Oooh no! Too much sunlight.'
4180.author: Geri Halliwell

4181.text: I think it takes a strong man to be in a relationship with a strong woman. A lot of people hear the word 'diva' and think of it as a negative. I see it as a positive. I want somebody who knows what they want out of life and isn't afraid to show it.
4181.author: Nick Cannon

4182.text: I learned one thing - never hate a positive option.
4182.author: Kevin Garnett

4183.text: I'm a very positive person. My grandmother taught me that happiness is both a skill and a decision, and you are responsible for the outcome.
4183.author: Helen McCrory

4184.text: Live your days on the positive side of life, in tune with your most treasured values. And in each moment you'll have much to live for.
4184.author: Ralph Marston

4185.text: Even with all the negativeness of the whole social media thing, I still think it's leaps and bounds more positive.
4185.author: Luke Bryan

4186.text: My grandmother, she's been the positive portion of my life the entire time.
4186.author: Curtis Jackson

4187.text: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.
4187.author: Lindsey Vonn

4188.text: I have a very positive attitude to anyone who is protecting the environment, but it's inadmissible when people are using it as a means of promoting themselves, using it as a source of self-enrichment. I don't want to name any specific examples... but often, environmentalism is used to blackmail companies.
4188.author: Vladimir Putin

4189.text: Positive thinking will let you use the ability which you have, and that is awesome.
4189.author: Zig Ziglar

4190.text: We are constituted so that simple acts of kindness, such as giving to charity or expressing gratitude, have a positive effect on our long-term moods. The key to the happy life, it seems, is the good life: a life with sustained relationships, challenging work, and connections to community.
4190.author: Paul Bloom

4191.text: I have always wanted to be a catalyst for bringing about positive change, inspiring others to choose goodness.
4191.author: Shari Arison

4192.text: Doing Good is a simple and universal vision. A vision to which each and every one of us can connect and contribute to its realisation. A vision based on the belief that by doing good deeds, positive thinking and affirmative choice of words, feelings and actions, we can enhance goodness in the world.
4192.author: Shari Arison

4193.text: For me, life is about being positive and hopeful, choosing to be joyful, choosing to be encouraging, choosing to be empowering.
4193.author: Billy Porter

4194.text: You can do everything you can to try to stop bad things from happening to you, but eventually things will happen, so the best prevention is a positive attitude.
4194.author: Marie Osmond

4195.text: I think there are a lot of really positive aspects to social media for novelists. Even though our work is pretty solitary, through Twitter and Tumblr and Facebook and Instagram and blogging in general, we're better able to connect directly with readers.
4195.author: Holly Black

4196.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
4196.author: Abraham Maslow

4197.text: Men are liars. We'll lie about lying if we have to. I'm an algebra liar. I figure two good lies make a positive.
4197.author: Tim Allen

4198.text: A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.
4198.author: Patricia Neal

4199.text: You should tell yourself frequently 'I will only react to constructive suggestions.' This gives you positive ammunition against your own negative thoughts and those of others.
4199.author: Jane Roberts

4200.text: Injustice, poverty, slavery, ignorance - these may be cured by reform or revolution. But men do not live only by fighting evils. They live by positive goals, individual and collective, a vast variety of them, seldom predictable, at times incompatible.
4200.author: Isaiah Berlin

4201.text: I did this role in Life Goes On as an HIV positive character and so emotionally that was the most challenging.
4201.author: Chad Lowe

4202.text: However, I must say that I am very happy to see that we have such a positive result for our first referendum in our history and that gives me more confidence in Taiwan's democracy.
4202.author: Chen Shui-bian

4203.text: His tenacity is unmatched in my opinion. Incredible how someone could have suffered that long and come back out of prison with such a good heart and positive things to say and do.
4203.author: Maurice Ashley

4204.text: Women are called upon to defend every bit of progress we have made against particularly virulent attack. But we must also hold out a vision, put forth a positive agenda of what women need and want and then move forward toward that dream.
4204.author: Patricia Ireland

4205.text: Players should know that if you can't make the contribution of the winning shot, that your attitude every day when you come to practice, or the positive contribution you make through cheering and keeping up team morale, is just as important in the overall picture.
4205.author: Sue Wicks

4206.text: You should also appreciate the goodness around you, and surround yourself with positive people.
4206.author: Nadia Comaneci

4207.text: To me, it doesn't matter how good you are. Sport is all about playing and competing. Whatever you do in cricket and in sport, enjoy it, be positive and try to win.
4207.author: Ian Botham

4208.text: I think anytime you can affect people in general, in a positive way, then you're a lucky individual.
4208.author: Sam Elliott

4209.text: We asserted ourselves as a music community, and showed legislators that music is positive. Especially if you've sold 300 million records worldwide and pay taxes.
4209.author: Krist Novoselic

4210.text: Freedom of religion is a principle that is central to our Nation's Declaration of Independence. Congress has taken this positive step to protect our freedom to express allegiance to America's flag and the ideals it represents.
4210.author: Ron Lewis

4211.text: A lasting solution to this problem will have an exceptionally positive influence foremost on the peoples of Palestine and Israel, as well as on the region and the international community.
4211.author: Recep Tayyip Erdogan

4213.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
4213.author: Harriet Tubman

4216.text: Unity is strength... when there is teamwork and collaboration, wonderful things can be achieved.
4216.author: Mattie Stepanek

4217.text: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
4217.author: Thomas Paine

4218.text: Strength and growth come only through continuous effort and struggle.
4218.author: Napoleon Hill

4222.text: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
4222.author: Winston Churchill

4223.text: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
4223.author: Helen Keller

4224.text: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
4224.author: Christopher Reeve

4225.text: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
4225.author: Buddha

4226.text: Silence is a source of great strength.
4226.author: Lao Tzu

4227.text: My family is my strength and my weakness.
4227.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

4228.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
4228.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

4230.text: There are dark shadows on the earth, but its lights are stronger in the contrast.
4230.author: Charles Dickens

4231.text: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
4231.author: Mahatma Gandhi

4233.text: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
4233.author: Ernest Hemingway

4234.text: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
4234.author: Samuel Johnson

4235.text: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
4235.author: Confucius

4236.text: I look forward to a great future for America - a future in which our country will match its military strength with our moral restraint, its wealth with our wisdom, its power with our purpose.
4236.author: John F. Kennedy

4237.text: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
4237.author: George Orwell

4238.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
4238.author: Marcus Aurelius

4239.text: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.
4239.author: Thomas Carlyle

4240.text: Being glamorous is about strength and confidence. It's black and white - dramatic. You have to be strong.
4240.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

4241.text: A truly strong person does not need the approval of others any more than a lion needs the approval of sheep.
4241.author: Vernon Howard

4242.text: This is no time for ease and comfort. It is time to dare and endure.
4242.author: Winston Churchill

4244.text: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
4244.author: Abraham Lincoln

4245.text: History teaches us that unity is strength, and cautions us to submerge and overcome our differences in the quest for common goals, to strive, with all our combined strength, for the path to true African brotherhood and unity.
4245.author: Haile Selassie

4246.text: Shallow men believe in luck. Strong men believe in cause and effect.
4246.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

4248.text: Calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence, so that's very important for good health.
4248.author: Dalai Lama

4250.text: The size of your success is measured by the strength of your desire; the size of your dream; and how you handle disappointment along the way.
4250.author: Robert Kiyosaki

4251.text: You can't get around pain and opposition, but you can try to be joyful in the trial, and thank yourself for the trial, and thank God for the strength to get through it.
4251.author: Mary J. Blige

4252.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
4252.author: Mahatma Gandhi

4253.text: Where there is no struggle, there is no strength.
4253.author: Oprah Winfrey

4254.text: Kites rise highest against the wind - not with it.
4254.author: Winston Churchill

4255.text: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
4255.author: Michael Jordan

4256.text: That though the radiance which was once so bright be now forever taken from my sight. Though nothing can bring back the hour of splendor in the grass, glory in the flower. We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind.
4256.author: William Wordsworth

4257.text: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
4257.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

4258.text: We need to reach that happy stage of our development when differences and diversity are not seen as sources of division and distrust, but of strength and inspiration.
4258.author: Josefa Iloilo

4259.text: The tax on capital gains directly affects investment decisions, the mobility and flow of risk capital... the ease or difficulty experienced by new ventures in obtaining capital, and thereby the strength and potential for growth in the economy.
4259.author: John F. Kennedy

4260.text: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go.
4260.author: Hermann Hesse

4261.text: The world is the great gymnasium where we come to make ourselves strong.
4261.author: Swami Vivekananda

4262.text: Endurance is not just the ability to bear a hard thing, but to turn it into glory.
4262.author: William Barclay

4263.text: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
4263.author: Maya Angelou

4264.text: Don't wait for extraordinary opportunities. Seize common occasions and make them great. Weak men wait for opportunities; strong men make them.
4264.author: Orison Swett Marden

4266.text: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
4266.author: Lao Tzu

4267.text: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
4267.author: Mother Teresa

4268.text: An American, a Negro... two souls, two thoughts, two unreconciled strivings; two warring ideals in one dark body, whose dogged strength alone keeps it from being torn asunder.
4268.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

4269.text: Fame is a vapor, popularity an accident, and riches take wings. Only one thing endures and that is character.
4269.author: Horace Greeley

4270.text: The man who is swimming against the stream knows the strength of it.
4270.author: Woodrow Wilson

4271.text: I like criticism. It makes you strong.
4271.author: LeBron James

4272.text: When I dare to be powerful - to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
4272.author: Audre Lorde

4273.text: We draw our strength from the very despair in which we have been forced to live. We shall endure.
4273.author: Cesar Chavez

4274.text: We are born weak, we need strength; helpless, we need aid; foolish, we need reason. All that we lack at birth, all that we need when we come to man's estate, is the gift of education.
4274.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

4275.text: The five separate fingers are five independent units. Close them and the fist multiplies strength. This is organization.
4275.author: James Cash Penney

4276.text: Fortitude is the guard and support of the other virtues.
4276.author: John Locke

4277.text: When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.
4277.author: Peter Marshall

4279.text: I am an example of what is possible when girls from the very beginning of their lives are loved and nurtured by people around them. I was surrounded by extraordinary women in my life who taught me about quiet strength and dignity.
4279.author: Michelle Obama

4281.text: From the depth of need and despair, people can work together, can organize themselves to solve their own problems and fill their own needs with dignity and strength.
4281.author: Cesar Chavez

4282.text: A nation that destroys its soils destroys itself. Forests are the lungs of our land, purifying the air and giving fresh strength to our people.
4282.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

4284.text: Thank you to all for your prayers and good wishes. It gave me the strength to persevere and warmed my heart.
4284.author: Steven Cojocaru

4285.text: Men are apt to mistake the strength of their feeling for the strength of their argument. The heated mind resents the chill touch and relentless scrutiny of logic.
4285.author: William E. Gladstone

4286.text: It doesn't take a lot of strength to hang on. It takes a lot of strength to let go.
4286.author: J. C. Watts

4287.text: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
4287.author: Khalil Gibran

4288.text: A strong woman is a woman determined to do something others are determined not be done.
4288.author: Marge Piercy

4289.text: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
4289.author: Saint Francis de Sales

4290.text: There is little that can withstand a man who can conquer himself.
4290.author: Louis XIV

4291.text: A single twig breaks, but the bundle of twigs is strong.
4291.author: Tecumseh

4293.text: If we resist our passions, it is more due to their weakness than our strength.
4293.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

4295.text: Power is not an institution, and not a structure; neither is it a certain strength we are endowed with; it is the name that one attributes to a complex strategical situation in a particular society.
4295.author: Michel Foucault

4296.text: I would fight for my liberty so long as my strength lasted, and if the time came for me to go, the Lord would let them take me.
4296.author: Harriet Tubman

4297.text: I feel like it's always about embracing what it is that you think is wrong with you. It's often times your greatest 'flaw' which actually forays into what is also your greatest strength.
4297.author: Olivia Thirlby

4298.text: The lesson of the Cuban Missile Crisis is plain: Strength prevents war; weakness invites it. We need a commander-in-chief who understands that - and who won't leave us facing a foe who thinks he doesn't.
4298.author: Arthur L. Herman

4299.text: Every good citizen adds to the strength of a nation.
4299.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

4300.text: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
4300.author: John Muir

4301.text: God has always given me the strength to say what is right.
4301.author: Rosa Parks

4302.text: I was in uniform for four years, and I know that heroism doesn't occur from taking orders, but rather from people who through their own willpower and strength are willing to sacrifice their lives for an idea.
4302.author: Thor Heyerdahl

4303.text: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
4303.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

4304.text: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
4304.author: John Ruskin

4305.text: We all have those things that even in the midst of stress and disarray, they energize us and give us renewed strength and purpose. These are our passions.
4305.author: Adam Braun

4306.text: If I didn't define myself for myself, I would be crunched into other people's fantasies for me and eaten alive.
4306.author: Audre Lorde

4308.text: Confession of errors is like a broom which sweeps away the dirt and leaves the surface brighter and clearer. I feel stronger for confession.
4308.author: Mahatma Gandhi

4309.text: I think a hero is an ordinary individual who finds strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
4309.author: Christopher Reeve

4310.text: This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble.
4310.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

4311.text: When adversity strikes, that's when you have to be the most calm. Take a step back, stay strong, stay grounded and press on.
4311.author: LL Cool J

4313.text: We can't equate spending on veterans with spending on defense. Our strength is not just in the size of our defense budget, but in the size of our hearts, in the size of our gratitude for their sacrifice. And that's not just measured in words or gestures.
4313.author: Jennifer Granholm

4314.text: There are movements which impinge upon the nerves with a strength that is incomparable, for movement has power to stir the senses and emotions, unique in itself.
4314.author: Doris Humphrey

4315.text: Good composition is like a suspension bridge - each line adds strength and takes none away.
4315.author: Robert Henri

4316.text: I think naturally, if you're an actor, there's a high level of assertiveness that you need to have to survive this business. There's boldness in being assertive, and there's strength and confidence.
4316.author: Bryan Cranston

4317.text: Superstars come and go. I want to make sure I am always a producer's actor. I may be refused to be called a great actor but I have never troubled any of my producers in my life. Honesty always catches the camera, and that is what my strength is.
4317.author: Akshay Kumar

4318.text: As long as I have health and strength, I will gladly work all my days.
4318.author: Frederic Chopin

4319.text: Being a caretaker is, and never will be, an easy job; in fact, it is that hardest job in the world and many times a thankless job. You have to be the pillar of strength even when you feel like you are crumbling to pieces inside.
4319.author: Jenna Morasca

4321.text: Liturgy is like a strong tree whose beauty is derived from the continuous renewal of its leaves, but whose strength comes from the old trunk, with solid roots in the ground.
4321.author: Pope Paul VI

4322.text: I know that, like every woman of the people, I have more strength than I appear to have.
4322.author: Evita Peron

4323.text: The depth and strength of a human character are defined by its moral reserves. People reveal themselves completely only when they are thrown out of the customary conditions of their life, for only then do they have to fall back on their reserves.
4323.author: Leon Trotsky

4324.text: Money doesn't mind if we say it's evil, it goes from strength to strength. It's a fiction, an addiction, and a tacit conspiracy.
4324.author: Martin Amis

4325.text: My greatest strength is common sense. I'm really a standard brand - like Campbell's tomato soup or Baker's chocolate.
4325.author: Katharine Hepburn

4326.text: In solitude the mind gains strength and learns to lean upon itself.
4326.author: Laurence Sterne

4327.text: There comes a pause, for human strength will not endure to dance without cessation; and everyone must reach the point at length of absolute prostration.
4327.author: Lewis Carroll

4328.text: When liberals finally grasped the strength of popular feeling about the family, they cried to appropriate the rhetoric and symbolism of family values for their own purposes.
4328.author: Christopher Lasch

4330.text: We must keep both our femininity and our strength.
4330.author: Indra Devi

4331.text: My strength and my weakness are twins in the same womb.
4331.author: Marge Piercy

4332.text: He knows not his own strength that has not met adversity.
4332.author: Ben Jonson

4334.text: Women have seldom sufficient employment to silence their feelings; a round of little cares, or vain pursuits frittering away all strength of mind and organs, they become naturally only objects of sense.
4334.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

4335.text: If the leader is filled with high ambition and if he pursues his aims with audacity and strength of will, he will reach them in spite of all obstacles.
4335.author: Carl von Clausewitz

4336.text: If only the strength of the love that people feel when it is reciprocated could be as intense and obsessive as the love we feel when it is not; then marriages would be truly made in heaven.
4336.author: Ben Elton

4337.text: Brain power improves by brain use, just as our bodily strength grows with exercise. And there is no doubt that a large proportion of the female population, from school days to late middle age, now have very complicated lives indeed.
4337.author: A. N. Wilson

4338.text: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say, 'I'm proud of what I am and who I am, and I'm just going to be myself.'
4338.author: Mariah Carey

4339.text: I couldn't beat people with my strength; I don't have a hard shot; I'm not the quickest skater in the league. My eyes and my mind have to do most of the work.
4339.author: Wayne Gretzky

4340.text: A lot of guys have muscles. A lot of strong men in this world. I think it's important to show that even under all this strength there's a fragile side, a side that can be affected.
4340.author: Sylvester Stallone

4341.text: My husband has quite simply been my strength and stay all these years, and I owe him a debt greater than he would ever claim.
4341.author: Queen Elizabeth II

4342.text: I think of novels in architectural terms. You have to enter at the gate, and this gate must be constructed in such a way that the reader has immediate confidence in the strength of the building.
4342.author: Ian Mcewan

4343.text: Tennis takes care of everything. It requires agility and quickness to get to the ball, core strength to get power into your shorts and stamina to last for an entire match. In addition to toning your arms and shoulders, it's a total body workout for your legs and abs, and works your heart and core unlike any other sport.
4343.author: Samantha Stosur

4344.text: The future belongs to us, because we have taken charge of it. We have the commitment, we have the resourcefulness, and we have the strength of our people to share the dream across Africa of clean water for all.
4344.author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

4345.text: Vampires are so old that they don't need to impress anyone anymore. They're comfortable in their own skin. It's this enigmatic strength that's very romantic and old-fashioned. I think it goes back to something of a Victorian attitude of finding a strong man who's going to look after his woman.
4345.author: Stephen Moyer

4348.text: Love truly does have the power to transcend evil. It can get us through the most unspeakable of events and give us the strength to keep on putting one foot in front of the other.
4348.author: Naomi Benaron

4350.text: All physical activity begins with the body's core. I maintain the strength in my core so that I can jump, run, start, stop, and accelerate at the highest levels.
4350.author: Derrick Rose

4351.text: I never won anything by myself. I was always strong because of help that gave me extra strength to win.
4351.author: Dan Gable

4352.text: The transfer of power is always a test of the constitutional system, a test of its strength.
4352.author: Vladimir Putin

4353.text: As a single mother of four, my mother taught me that you always want to show up strong for the moments that really matter with family, friends, and community. I now recognize how her strength helped shape the person I am today and the mother that I have become.
4353.author: Andie MacDowell

4354.text: In America we have a Declaration of Independence, but our history, our advancements, our global strength all point to an American declaration of interdependence.
4354.author: Cory Booker

4355.text: Our strength as a nation comes in our unity. We are the United States of America, not the divided states. And those who want to divide us are trying to divide us, and we shouldn't let them do it.
4355.author: Ben Carson

4356.text: Only one who devotes himself to a cause with his whole strength and soul can be a true master. For this reason mastery demands all of a person.
4356.author: Albert Einstein

4357.text: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
4357.author: Albert Schweitzer

4358.text: Don't expect to build up the weak by pulling down the strong.
4358.author: Calvin Coolidge

4359.text: The men who learn endurance, are they who call the whole world, brother.
4359.author: Charles Dickens

4360.text: Anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strength.
4360.author: Charles Spurgeon

4361.text: Life only demands from you the strength that you possess. Only one feat is possible; not to run away.
4361.author: Dag Hammarskjold

4362.text: Don't be afraid to give your best to what seemingly are small jobs. Every time you conquer one it makes you that much stronger. If you do the little jobs well, the big ones will tend to take care of themselves.
4362.author: Dale Carnegie

4363.text: A mind at peace, a mind centered and not focused on harming others, is stronger than any physical force in the universe.
4363.author: Wayne Dyer

4364.text: Nothing has more strength than dire necessity.
4364.author: Euripides

4365.text: Only the gentle are ever really strong.
4365.author: James Dean

4366.text: Strength is the capacity to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces.
4366.author: Judith Viorst

4367.text: You can't really be strong until you see a funny side to things.
4367.author: Ken Kesey

4368.text: Only the weak are cruel. Gentleness can only be expected from the strong.
4368.author: Leo Buscaglia

4369.text: Because your own strength is unequal to the task, do not assume that it is beyond the powers of man; but if anything is within the powers and province of man, believe that it is within your own compass also.
4369.author: Marcus Aurelius

4370.text: A strong man doesn't have to be dominant toward a woman. He doesn't match his strength against a woman weak with love for him. He matches it against the world.
4370.author: Marilyn Monroe

4371.text: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
4371.author: Max Lerner

4372.text: Even cowards can endure hardship; only the brave can endure suspense.
4372.author: Mignon McLaughlin

4373.text: The strong man is the one who is able to intercept at will the communication between the senses and the mind.
4373.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

4374.text: Does anybody really think that they didn't get what they had because they didn't have the talent or the strength or the endurance or the commitment?
4374.author: Nelson Mandela

4375.text: Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You will find that they haven't half the strength you think they have.
4375.author: Norman Vincent Peale

4376.text: Sure I am of this, that you have only to endure to conquer.
4376.author: Winston Churchill

4377.text: Strong and bitter words indicate a weak cause.
4377.author: Victor Hugo

4378.text: As we advance in life it becomes more and more difficult, but in fighting the difficulties the inmost strength of the heart is developed.
4378.author: Vincent Van Gogh

4379.text: Every calamity is to be overcome by endurance.
4379.author: Virgil

4381.text: Only by contending with challenges that seem to be beyond your strength to handle at the moment you can grow more surely toward the stars.
4381.author: Brian Tracy

4382.text: Strength of character means the ability to overcome resentment against others, to hide hurt feelings, and to forgive quickly.
4382.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

4383.text: Life is very interesting... in the end, some of your greatest pains, become your greatest strengths.
4383.author: Drew Barrymore

4384.text: As long as we persevere and endure, we can get anything we want.
4384.author: Mike Tyson

4385.text: It is the characteristic excellence of the strong man that he can bring momentous issues to the fore and make a decision about them. The weak are always forced to decide between alternatives they have not chosen themselves.
4385.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

4386.text: We can be tired, weary and emotionally distraught, but after spending time alone with God, we find that He injects into our bodies energy, power and strength.
4386.author: Charles Stanley

4387.text: I think I was born strong-willed. That's not the kind of thing you can learn. The advantage is, you stick to what you believe in and rarely get pushed out of what you want to do.
4387.author: Joan Jett

4388.text: If you learn how to forgive others for not being strong, then people can learn how to forgive you for your own issues.
4388.author: T. D. Jakes

4389.text: May He who is the Brahman of the Hindus, the Ahura-Mazda of the Zoroastrians, the Buddha of the Buddhists, the Jehovah of the Jews, the Father in Heaven of the Christians give strength to you to carry out your noble idea.
4389.author: Swami Vivekananda

4390.text: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
4390.author: Jean de La Fontaine

4391.text: You can train your mental strength just like you train your body. If your body looks fit or ripped, it looks strong, and you can flex your muscles. So, physically, you have a certain strength. Mentally, it's the same thing. You can train your psychological strength.
4391.author: Wladimir Klitschko

4393.text: For a lot of people, Superman is and has always been America's hero. He stands for what we believe is the best within us: limitless strength tempered by compassion, that can bear adversity and emerge stronger on the other side. He stands for what we all feel we would like to be able to stand for, when standing is hardest.
4393.author: J. Michael Straczynski

4394.text: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.
4394.author: Eckhart Tolle

4395.text: It takes strength to make your way through grief, to grab hold of life and let it pull you forward.
4395.author: Patti Davis

4397.text: Our ability to handle life's challenges is a measure of our strength of character.
4397.author: Les Brown

4398.text: I felt invincible. My strength was that of a giant. God was certainly standing by me. I smashed five saloons with rocks before I ever took a hatchet.
4398.author: Carry Nation

4399.text: True strength lies in submission which permits one to dedicate his life, through devotion, to something beyond himself.
4399.author: Henry Miller

4401.text: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal. My strength lies solely in my tenacity.
4401.author: Louis Pasteur

4402.text: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow. It empties today of its strength.
4402.author: Corrie Ten Boom

4403.text: Old age is not a disease - it is strength and survivorship, triumph over all kinds of vicissitudes and disappointments, trials and illnesses.
4403.author: Maggie Kuhn

4404.text: Only strength can cooperate. Weakness can only beg.
4404.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

4405.text: The spirit of man is more important than mere physical strength, and the spiritual fiber of a nation than its wealth.
4405.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

4406.text: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.
4406.author: Billy Graham

4407.text: My greatest strength as a consultant is to be ignorant and ask a few questions.
4407.author: Peter Drucker

4409.text: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength.
4409.author: Charles Caleb Colton

4410.text: Strength of mind rests in sobriety; for this keeps your reason unclouded by passion.
4410.author: Pythagoras

4411.text: When restraint and courtesy are added to strength, the latter becomes irresistible.
4411.author: Mahatma Gandhi

4412.text: Strength and wisdom are not opposing values.
4412.author: William J. Clinton

4413.text: Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.
4413.author: Vincent Van Gogh

4414.text: Those who have the strength and the love to sit with a dying patient in the silence that goes beyond words will know that this moment is neither frightening nor painful, but a peaceful cessation of the functioning of the body.
4414.author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

4415.text: Freedom comes from strength and self-reliance.
4415.author: Lisa Murkowski

4416.text: The colour of the skin is in no way connected with strength of the mind or intellectual powers.
4416.author: Benjamin Banneker

4417.text: The mask can be a limitation, but you just deal with it. You do get superhuman strength and pumpkin bombs and all this other stuff to express yourself with.'
4417.author: Willem Dafoe

4418.text: I look at an ant and I see myself: a native South African, endowed by nature with a strength much greater than my size so I might cope with the weight of a racism that crushes my spirit.
4418.author: Miriam Makeba

4419.text: Once more, Never think that you can live to God by your own power or strength; but always look to and rely on him for assistance, yea, for all strength and grace.
4419.author: David Brainerd

4420.text: Remember, the storm is a good opportunity for the pine and the cypress to show their strength and their stability.
4420.author: Ho Chi Minh

4421.text: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws.
4421.author: Barbara Kingsolver

4422.text: Some great men owe most of their greatness to the ability of detecting in those they destine for their tools the exact quality of strength that matters for their work.
4422.author: Joseph Conrad

4423.text: Flexibility is crucial to my fitness. Incorporating a good warm-up and cool-down into every session decreases my chances of injury. I use both dynamic and static stretching in my training. I've starting doing a few yoga sessions which incorporates muscle strength and flexibility.
4423.author: Samantha Stosur

4424.text: The military might of a country represents its national strength. Only when it builds up its military might in every way can it develop into a thriving country.
4424.author: Kim Jong-un

4425.text: We get strength and encouragement from watching children.
4425.author: Hayao Miyazaki

4426.text: When you have a certain fitness projection, it's going to give you an advantage. Having strength, stamina and speed is important because I'm working with dogs who can kill me.
4426.author: Cesar Millan

4427.text: Remember to look at your glass half full and not half empty. A lot of my strength comes from God. God has given me a gift - the gift of life - and it's amazing that I live each day.
4427.author: Mattie Stepanek

4428.text: The lesson of 9/11 is that America is truly exceptional. We withstood the worst attack of our history, intended by our enemies to destroy us. Instead, it drew us closer and made us more united. Our love for freedom and one another has given us a strength that surprised even ourselves.
4428.author: Rudy Giuliani

4429.text: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success.
4429.author: Zig Ziglar

4430.text: The only reason I took steroids was for my health purposes. I did not take steroids to get any gain for any strength purposes.
4430.author: Mark McGwire

4432.text: The French Revolution will be found to have had great influence on the strength of parties, and on the subsequent political transactions of the United States.
4432.author: John Marshall

4433.text: We - we need strength, we need energy, we need quickness and we need brain in this country to turn it around.
4433.author: Donald Trump

4434.text: One ever feels his twoness - an American, a Negro; two souls, two thoughts, two unreconciled strivings; two warring ideals in one dark body, whose dogged strength alone keeps it from being torn asunder.
4434.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

4435.text: He knows not his own strength that hath not met adversity.
4435.author: Cesare Pavese

4436.text: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest.
4436.author: Paul Cezanne

4437.text: Prayer is more than meditation. In meditation the source of strength is one's self. When one prays he goes to a source of strength greater than his own.
4437.author: Chiang Kai-shek

4438.text: Each blade of grass has its spot on earth whence it draws its life, its strength; and so is man rooted to the land from which he draws his faith together with his life.
4438.author: Joseph Conrad

4439.text: The separation of church and state is a source of strength, but the conscience of our nation does not call for separation between men of state and faith in the Supreme Being.
4439.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

4440.text: All the strength and force of man comes from his faith in things unseen. He who believes is strong; he who doubts is weak. Strong convictions precede great actions.
4440.author: James Freeman Clarke

4441.text: If you make the unconditional commitment to reach your most important goals, if the strength of your decision is sufficient, you will find the way and the power to achieve your goals.
4441.author: Robert Conklin

4442.text: Lust is to the other passions what the nervous fluid is to life; it supports them all, lends strength to them all ambition, cruelty, avarice, revenge, are all founded on lust.
4442.author: Marquis de Sade

4443.text: America is moving forward and gaining strength. We have been tested, and we have proven ourselves to be a tough, resilient and resourceful nation.
4443.author: Bill Frist

4444.text: Something called 'the Oklahoma Standard' became known throughout the world. It means resilience in the face of adversity. It means a strength and compassion that will not be defeated.
4444.author: Brad Henry

4445.text: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.
4445.author: Phil Jackson

4452.text: Coming together is a beginning; keeping together is progress; working together is success.
4452.author: Henry Ford

4454.text: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.
4454.author: Abraham Lincoln

4457.text: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
4457.author: Albert Einstein

4462.text: Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at the right time.
4462.author: Arnold H. Glasow

4464.text: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
4464.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

4466.text: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.
4466.author: Tommy Hilfiger

4468.text: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
4468.author: Jim Rohn

4471.text: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
4471.author: Napoleon Hill

4472.text: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
4472.author: Bill Bradley

4473.text: Success is not a destination, but the road that you're on. Being successful means that you're working hard and walking your walk every day. You can only live your dream by working hard towards it. That's living your dream.
4473.author: Marlon Wayans

4474.text: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
4474.author: Bill Gates

4475.text: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
4475.author: Nelson Mandela

4476.text: We learned about honesty and integrity - that the truth matters... that you don't take shortcuts or play by your own set of rules... and success doesn't count unless you earn it fair and square.
4476.author: Michelle Obama

4477.text: Without continual growth and progress, such words as improvement, achievement, and success have no meaning.
4477.author: Benjamin Franklin

4478.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
4478.author: Albert Einstein

4479.text: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
4479.author: Mario Andretti

4480.text: Humility is the true key to success. Successful people lose their way at times. They often embrace and overindulge from the fruits of success. Humility halts this arrogance and self-indulging trap. Humble people share the credit and wealth, remaining focused and hungry to continue the journey of success.
4480.author: Rick Pitino

4481.text: If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.
4481.author: Henry Ford

4484.text: Communication - the human connection - is the key to personal and career success.
4484.author: Paul J. Meyer

4485.text: Focused, hard work is the real key to success. Keep your eyes on the goal, and just keep taking the next step towards completing it. If you aren't sure which way to do something, do it both ways and see which works better.
4485.author: John Carmack

4486.text: We learned about gratitude and humility - that so many people had a hand in our success, from the teachers who inspired us to the janitors who kept our school clean... and we were taught to value everyone's contribution and treat everyone with respect.
4486.author: Michelle Obama

4487.text: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
4487.author: Bobby Unser

4491.text: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
4491.author: Vince Lombardi

4494.text: The secret of your success is determined by your daily agenda.
4494.author: John C. Maxwell

4495.text: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
4495.author: Walter Scott

4497.text: No man succeeds without a good woman behind him. Wife or mother, if it is both, he is twice blessed indeed.
4497.author: Godfrey Winn

4499.text: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
4499.author: Alexander Graham Bell

4502.text: Growing up in a group home, and with an undiagnosed learning disability to boot, the odds of success were not on my side. But when I joined the high school football team, I learned the value of discipline, focus, persistence, and teamwork - all skills that have proven vital to my career as a C.E.O. and social entrepreneur.
4502.author: Darell Hammond

4503.text: My success was due to good luck, hard work, and support and advice from friends and mentors. But most importantly, it depended on me to keep trying after I had failed.
4503.author: Mark Warner

4504.text: Success makes so many people hate you. I wish it wasn't that way. It would be wonderful to enjoy success without seeing envy in the eyes of those around you.
4504.author: Marilyn Monroe

4505.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
4505.author: Pablo Picasso

4506.text: Man needs his difficulties because they are necessary to enjoy success.
4506.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

4507.text: Honesty and loyalty are key. If two people can be honest with each other about everything, that's probably the biggest key to success.
4507.author: Taylor Lautner

4508.text: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
4508.author: Helen Keller

4509.text: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
4509.author: Arthur Ashe

4512.text: Success is almost totally dependent upon drive and persistence. The extra energy required to make another effort or try another approach is the secret of winning.
4512.author: Denis Waitley

4513.text: Winning isn't everything, it's the only thing.
4513.author: Vince Lombardi

4517.text: Sometimes we may ask God for success, and He gives us physical and mental stamina. We might plead for prosperity, and we receive enlarged perspective and increased patience, or we petition for growth and are blessed with the gift of grace. He may bestow upon us conviction and confidence as we strive to achieve worthy goals.
4517.author: David A. Bednar

4521.text: The road to success is always under construction.
4521.author: Arnold Palmer

4522.text: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
4522.author: Napoleon Hill

4523.text: The greatest sign of success for a teacher... is to be able to say, 'The children are now working as if I did not exist.'
4523.author: Maria Montessori

4524.text: Success is nothing if you don't have the right people to share it with; you're just gonna end up lonely.
4524.author: Selena Gomez

4525.text: There is never just one thing that leads to success for anyone. I feel it always a combination of passion, dedication, hard work, and being in the right place at the right time.
4525.author: Lauren Conrad

4526.text: I wish I could just go tell all the young women I work with, all these fabulous women, 'Believe in yourself and negotiate for yourself. Own your own success.' I wish I could tell that to my daughter. But it's not that simple.
4526.author: Sheryl Sandberg

4529.text: I'm always asked, 'What's the secret to success?' But there are no secrets. Be humble. Be hungry. And always be the hardest worker in the room.
4529.author: Dwayne Johnson

4530.text: Invincibility lies in the defence; the possibility of victory in the attack.
4530.author: Sun Tzu

4532.text: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
4532.author: Wilma Mankiller

4533.text: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.
4533.author: Saint Augustine

4535.text: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
4535.author: George Bernard Shaw

4537.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
4537.author: Henry David Thoreau

4538.text: Have regular hours for work and play; make each day both useful and pleasant, and prove that you understand the worth of time by employing it well. Then youth will be delightful, old age will bring few regrets, and life will become a beautiful success.
4538.author: Louisa May Alcott

4539.text: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
4539.author: George S. Patton

4541.text: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
4541.author: Henry David Thoreau

4542.text: To this day, just always treat people the way you want to be treated. Whether it's family or friends or co-workers, I think it's the most important thing. Whether you have success or don't have it, whether you're a good person is all that matters.
4542.author: Brenda Song

4543.text: Just remember, you can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
4543.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

4544.text: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.
4544.author: Ramana Maharshi

4545.text: A great social success is a pretty girl who plays her cards as carefully as if she were plain.
4545.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

4547.text: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
4547.author: Booker T. Washington

4548.text: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.
4548.author: Dale Carnegie

4549.text: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
4549.author: David Brinkley

4550.text: Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
4550.author: Jim Rohn

4552.text: Let every nation know, whether it wishes us well or ill, that we shall pay any price, bear any burden, meet any hardship, support any friend, oppose any foe to assure the survival and the success of liberty.
4552.author: John F. Kennedy

4553.text: Discipline is the soul of an army. It makes small numbers formidable; procures success to the weak, and esteem to all.
4553.author: George Washington

4554.text: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success.
4554.author: Wiz Khalifa

4556.text: I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.
4556.author: John D. Rockefeller

4559.text: Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
4559.author: Joyce Brothers

4560.text: The secret of success is to be in harmony with existence, to be always calm to let each wave of life wash us a little farther up the shore.
4560.author: Cyril Connolly

4561.text: My success isn't a result of arrogance - it's a result of belief.
4561.author: Conor McGregor

4563.text: There is little success where there is little laughter.
4563.author: Andrew Carnegie

4564.text: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
4564.author: Bob Dylan

4566.text: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.
4566.author: Maya Angelou

4567.text: Learning and innovation go hand in hand. The arrogance of success is to think that what you did yesterday will be sufficient for tomorrow.
4567.author: William Pollard

4568.text: Creativity is the key to success in the future, and primary education is where teachers can bring creativity in children at that level.
4568.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

4569.text: Success is a journey, not a destination.
4569.author: Ben Sweetland

4570.text: Being kind is the most important thing I've ever been taught. That's what my parents always told me - more important than ambition or success is being kind to people. The cornerstone of my life. What I aspire to is to be kind.
4570.author: Rafe Spall

4571.text: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
4571.author: Tony Robbins

4572.text: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
4572.author: Dale Carnegie

4575.text: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that 'individuality' is the key to success.
4575.author: Robert Orben

4576.text: There is nothing more difficult to take in hand, more perilous to conduct, or more uncertain in its success, than to take the lead in the introduction of a new order of things.
4576.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

4577.text: Honesty and integrity are absolutely essential for success in life - all areas of life. The really good news is that anyone can develop both honesty and integrity.
4577.author: Zig Ziglar

4578.text: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
4578.author: W. Clement Stone

4579.text: What material success does is provide you with the ability to concentrate on other things that really matter. And that is being able to make a difference, not only in your own life, but in other people's lives.
4579.author: Oprah Winfrey

4580.text: The ladder of success is never crowded at the top.
4580.author: Napoleon Hill

4583.text: A champion is afraid of losing. Everyone else is afraid of winning.
4583.author: Billie Jean King

4584.text: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
4584.author: Christopher Morley

4586.text: Success is counted sweetest by those who never succeed.
4586.author: Emily Dickinson

4587.text: Victory has a thousand fathers, but defeat is an orphan.
4587.author: John F. Kennedy

4588.text: To be prepared is half the victory.
4588.author: Miguel de Cervantes

4589.text: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
4589.author: Audrey Hepburn

4590.text: Success isn't measured by money or power or social rank. Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace.
4590.author: Mike Ditka

4591.text: There are people who make things happen, there are people who watch things happen, and there are people who wonder what happened. To be successful, you need to be a person who makes things happen.
4591.author: Jim Lovell

4593.text: Every soldier must know, before he goes into battle, how the little battle he is to fight fits into the larger picture, and how the success of his fighting will influence the battle as a whole.
4593.author: Bernard Law Montgomery

4594.text: If there is any one secret of success, it lies in the ability to get the other person's point of view and see things from that person's angle as well as from your own.
4594.author: Henry Ford

4595.text: I'm not really easy to live with! There needs to be unlimited patience and unconditional love. Men I've known before loved my independent spirit and were proud of my success, to the point that they'd become jealous of the time I devote to my career.
4595.author: Milla Jovovich

4596.text: The grass is always greener on the other side - until you get there and see it's AstroTurf. Symbols are never reality. Someone might have amassed material success and fame, but that doesn't mean they're happy. So, don't go judging a person's life by the cover.
4596.author: Karen Salmansohn

4597.text: Before everything else, getting ready is the secret of success.
4597.author: Henry Ford

4598.text: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you're in control of your life. If you don't, life controls you.
4598.author: Tony Robbins

4599.text: The battle of life is, in most cases, fought uphill; and to win it without a struggle were perhaps to win it without honor. If there were no difficulties there would be no success; if there were nothing to struggle for, there would be nothing to be achieved.
4599.author: Samuel Smiles

4600.text: Ambition is the path to success, persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
4600.author: William Eardley IV

4601.text: Make treating yourself a priority and always remember your life is happening now. Don't put off all your dreams and pleasures to another day. In any balanced personal definition of success there has to be a powerful element of living life in the present.
4601.author: Mireille Guiliano

4603.text: Just remember: to be grateful and thank the people who are there and support you along the way is a great start to success.
4603.author: Meryl Davis

4604.text: The decadent international but individualistic capitalism in the hands of which we found ourselves after the war is not a success. It is not intelligent. It is not beautiful. It is not just. It is not virtuous. And it doesn't deliver the goods.
4604.author: John Maynard Keynes

4605.text: Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome.
4605.author: Arthur Ashe

4606.text: Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.
4606.author: Zig Ziglar

4607.text: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
4607.author: Conrad Hilton

4609.text: All those who are around me are the bridge to my success, so they are all important.
4609.author: Manny Pacquiao

4610.text: Success to me is being a good person, treating people well.
4610.author: David LaChapelle

4611.text: Success is not a function of the size of your title but the richness of your contribution.
4611.author: Robin S. Sharma

4612.text: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success. You may have the greatest bunch of individual stars in the world, but if they don't play together, the club won't be worth a dime.
4612.author: Babe Ruth

4613.text: Success is the sum of small efforts - repeated day in and day out.
4613.author: Robert Collier

4614.text: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying the basic fundamentals.
4614.author: Jim Rohn

4615.text: The negative side of the American Dream comes when people pursue success at any cost, which in turn destroys the vision and the dream.
4615.author: Azar Nafisi

4617.text: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall.
4617.author: Oliver Goldsmith

4618.text: The secret of my success is a two word answer: Know people.
4618.author: Harvey S. Firestone

4619.text: I couldn't wait for success, so I went ahead without it.
4619.author: Jonathan Winters

4620.text: Success cannot come from standstill men. Methods change and men must change with them.
4620.author: James Cash Penney

4621.text: You might well remember that nothing can bring you success but yourself.
4621.author: Napoleon Hill

4622.text: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined.
4622.author: Johnny Carson

4623.text: I think the biggest challenge is to continue on the same path. I think it's easy to become complacent from the success you've had.
4623.author: Jason Derulo

4625.text: Over the years, I've become barraged by comments from people, such as, 'Beam me up, Scotty!' and I became defensive. I felt they were derisive and engendered an attitude. I am grateful for the success, but didn't want to be mocked.
4625.author: William Shatner

4626.text: To put it bluntly, there isn't one economic theory that can single-handedly explain Singapore's success; its economy combines extreme features of capitalism and socialism. All theories are partial; reality is complex.
4626.author: Ha-Joon Chang

4629.text: Belief in oneself is one of the most important bricks in building any successful venture.
4629.author: Lydia M. Child

4630.text: What is success? I think it is a mixture of having a flair for the thing that you are doing; knowing that it is not enough, that you have got to have hard work and a certain sense of purpose.
4630.author: Margaret Thatcher

4631.text: Success has a simple formula: do your best, and people may like it.
4631.author: Sam Ewing

4632.text: Once you agree upon the price you and your family must pay for success, it enables you to ignore the minor hurts, the opponent's pressure, and the temporary failures.
4632.author: Vince Lombardi

4635.text: God lets you be successful because he trusts you that you will do the right thing with it. Now, does he get disappointed often? All the time, because people get there and they forget how they got it.
4635.author: Steve Harvey

4636.text: I can't imagine a person becoming a success who doesn't give this game of life everything he's got.
4636.author: Walter Cronkite

4637.text: I think that my biggest attribute to any success that I have had is hard work. There really is no substitute for working hard.
4637.author: Maria Bartiromo

4638.text: I think it's way harder when you have success, 'cause people tend to not treat you the same or look at you the same because they see the success or the money you make.
4638.author: Meek Mill

4641.text: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
4641.author: Dale Turner

4643.text: If we study learning as a data science, we can reverse engineer the human brain and tailor learning techniques to maximize the chances of student success. This is the biggest revolution that could happen in education, turning it into a data-driven science, and not such a medieval set of rumors professors tend to carry on.
4643.author: Sebastian Thrun

4645.text: Men of age object too much, consult too long, adventure too little, repent too soon, and seldom drive business home to the full period, but content themselves with a mediocrity of success.
4645.author: Dale Carnegie

4647.text: Success in life comes not from holding a good hand, but in playing a poor hand well.
4647.author: Denis Waitley

4648.text: Time is the most precious element of human existence. The successful person knows how to put energy into time and how to draw success from time.
4648.author: Denis Waitley

4649.text: You've got to ask! Asking is, in my opinion, the world's most powerful - and neglected - secret to success and happiness.
4649.author: Percy Ross

4650.text: Success in its highest and noblest form calls for peace of mind and enjoyment and happiness which come only to the man who has found the work that he likes best.
4650.author: Napoleon Hill

4651.text: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.
4651.author: Wayne Dyer

4652.text: The successful man doesn't use others, other people use the successful man, for above all the success is of service.
4652.author: Mark Caine

4653.text: How easy to be amiable in the midst of happiness and success.
4653.author: William Ellery Channing

4654.text: Success is about enjoying what you have and where you are, while pursuing achievable goals.
4654.author: Bo Bennett

4655.text: A rejection is nothing more than a necessary step in the pursuit of success.
4655.author: Bo Bennett

4656.text: When it comes to success, there are no shortcuts.
4656.author: Bo Bennett

4657.text: Success comes to a writer as a rule, so gradually that it is always something of a shock to him to look back and realize the heights to which he has climbed.
4657.author: P. G. Wodehouse

4658.text: I believe that being successful means having a balance of success stories across the many areas of your life. You can't truly be considered successful in your business life if your home life is in shambles.
4658.author: Zig Ziglar

4660.text: Success in training the boy depends largely on the Scoutmaster's own personal example.
4660.author: Robert Baden-Powell

4661.text: Personally, I don't like the term 'success.' It's too arbitrary and too relative a thing. It's usually someone else's definition, not yours.
4661.author: Ichiro Suzuki

4662.text: I live again the days and evenings of my long career. I dream at night of operas and concerts in which I have had my share of success. Now like the old Irish minstrel, I have hung up my harp because my songs are all sung.
4662.author: John McCormack

4663.text: We are taught to consume. And that's what we do. But if we realized that there really is no reason to consume, that it's just a mind set, that it's just an addiction, then we wouldn't be out there stepping on people's hands climbing the corporate ladder of success.
4663.author: River Phoenix

4664.text: You are a product of your environment. So choose the environment that will best develop you toward your objective. Analyze your life in terms of its environment. Are the things around you helping you toward success - or are they holding you back?
4664.author: W. Clement Stone

4665.text: Also, it's risky to try to duplicate earlier success. Magician had a certain charm to it, mostly due to my choice of lead characters, that I would be hard put to duplicate.
4665.author: Raymond E. Feist

4666.text: All of us are born for a reason, but all of us don't discover why. Success in life has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.
4666.author: Danny Thomas

4667.text: When I meet successful people I ask 100 questions as to what they attribute their success to. It is usually the same: persistence, hard work and hiring good people.
4667.author: Kiana Tom

4668.text: The great dream merchant Disney was a success because make-believe was what everyone seemed to need in a spiritually empty land.
4668.author: Arthur Erickson

4669.text: You've got to work hard for your success and you've got to have a steady presence. That's the secret.
4669.author: Kid Rock

4670.text: The success of the Rat Pack or the Clan was due to the camaraderie, the three guys who work together and kid each other and love each other.
4670.author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

4671.text: A woman who is loved always has success.
4671.author: Vicki Baum

4672.text: Humor has bailed me out of more tight situations than I can think of. If you go with your instincts and keep your humor, creativity follows. With luck, success comes, too.
4672.author: Jimmy Buffett

4673.text: Success - it's what you do with what you've got.
4673.author: Woody Hayes

4674.text: Your success depends mainly upon what you think of yourself and whether you believe in yourself.
4674.author: William J. H. Boetcker
